articles.author: Niccolo Conte
articles.title: Mapping US Wind Energy Generation by State - Elements by Visual Capitalist
articles.description: Wind energy is the largest source of renewable electricity in North America. This graphic maps U.S. states by wind electricity generation.
articles.content:
Over the last 200 years, how we’ve gotten our energy has changed drastically.
These changes were driven by innovations like the steam engine, oil lamps, internal combustion engines, and the wide-sca… [+5520 chars]
